FAUST4.original: ~r~Faustin's daughter is dead.
Use ~PAD_LSTICK_UPDOWN~ to shift your weight forwards and backwards when on a bike.
FAUST4.translated: 用~PAD_LSTICK_UPDOWN~前后移动你在摩托车上的重心。

FAUST4.original: Press ~INPUT_VEH_BRAKE~ to brake.
Use ~PAD_SIXAXIS_PITCH~ to shift your weight forwards and backwards when on a bike.
FAUST4.translated: 用~PAD_SIXAXIS_PITCH~前后移动你在摩托车上的重心。

FAUST4.original: ~r~The biker got away.
The ~r~biker~s~ is getting away, catch up with him on a ~b~bike~s~ then take him out.
FAUST4.translated: ~r~飞车党~s~正在逃跑，骑~b~摩托车~s~跟着他，然后干掉他。

FAUST4.original: ~s~When free aiming or locked onto a target use ~INPUT_MOVE_LEFT~ and press ~INPUT_JUMP~ to roll.
FAUST4.translated: ~s~自由射击或锁定目标时，用~INPUT_MOVE_LEFT~+~INPUT_JUMP~侧滚。

FAUST4.original: Press ~INPUT_VEH_ACCELERATE~ to accelerate. Use ~PAD_LSTICK_LEFTRIGHT_VEH~ to steer a bike.
~s~Chase down all the ~r~bikers~s~ and wipe them out.
Press ~INPUT_VEH_ATTACK~ to use a weapon while on a bike.
FAUST4.translated: 按~INPUT_VEH_ATTACK~在摩托车上使用武器。

FAUST4.original: Press ~INPUT_VEH_ACCELERATE~ to accelerate. Use ~PAD_LSTICK_LEFTRIGHT~ to steer a bike.
Go to ~y~Firefly Island.
~s~PLACEHOLDER CUTSCENE.
~s~Get on the ~b~bike ~s~and chase him down.
Get back on the ~b~bike,~s~ the biker is getting away.
FAUST4.translated: 回到~b~摩托~s~上，飞车党要跑掉了。

FAUST4.original: ~s~You can blow up gas pumps.
~s~Rolling will help you avoid gun fire.
~s~The ~r~biker~s~ is heading into the gas station.
Use ~PAD_RSTICK_ALL~ to look around whilst on a bike.
FAUST4.translated: 用~PAD_RSTICK_ALL~在摩托车上环顾四周。

FAUST4.original: Press ~INPUT_VEH_ACCELERATE~ to accelerate. Use ~PAD_SIXAXIS_ROLL~ to steer a bike.
~s~Take out the ~r~biker.
~s~When aiming use ~PAD_LSTICK_LEFTRIGHT~ and press ~INPUT_JUMP~ to roll.
~s~Gas stations are full of explosive objects.
Use ~INPUT_VEH_KEY_UD~ to shift your weight forwards and backwards when on a bike.
FAUST4.translated: 用~INPUT_VEH_KEY_UD~前后移动你在摩托车上的重心。
